Desc.entry: Part of Sheffield City Council's Children and Young People's Service. Responsible for ensuring that they comply with government vision, that sets out a diverse early learning and childcare system to ensure that all children have the best start across all sectors in health, education and social care. Responsible tor delivering the Early Years Outcomes to raise standards, improve outcomes and reduce inequalities for young children across all services. Plays a part in contributing to the Every Child Matters agenda for 0-5 years. Accountable for the delivery of the Early Years services to meet the needs of families living within a Children's Centre area. Bring together the lead agencies to ensure the effective delivery of services through good planning and implementation.
